COMMENT_TX: $as Yasiel Puig moved down the 1B line, Adrian Gonzalez challenged catcher Yadier Molina; HP umpire Jerry Meals got between them and both benches emptied; Gonzalez and Molina yelled at each other and there was some pushing in the crowd of players; Molina pushed Meals out of the way to get to Gonzalez; Molina was fined for his actions; there is history between the teams from the 2013 post season
